metadata.title: CVE-2020-9760 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in WeeChat before 2.7.1 (0.3.4 to 2.7 areaffected). When a new IRC message 005 is received with longer nickprefixes, a buffer overflow and possibly a crash can happen when a new modeis set for a nick.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9760` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-core - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-curses - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-plugins - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: weechat package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
